item.title: .NET and AWS S3 with LocalStack: How to develop with local S3 buckets
item.description: LocalStack is an open-source framework that allows us to emulate the major AWS services locally, making it easier to develop and test cloud applications without incurring the cost and complexity of deploying to a real cloud environment. In this post, I’ll show how to configure it to emulate S3 buckets and how to interact with those buckets from a C# application.
item.postDescription: LocalStack is an open-source framework that allows us to emulate the major AWS services locally, making it easier to develop and test cloud applications without incurring the cost and complexity of deploying to a real cloud environment. In this post, I’ll show how to configure it to emulate S3 buckets and how to interact with those buckets from a C# application.

item.title: VS Code extensions worth trying out
item.description: Visual Studio Code is the most used IDE according to the Stack Overflow 2022’s Developer Survey and it has lots of extensions to help us be more productive. Even developers who use another main IDE probably use VS Code for some part of their jobs. In this post I’ll show some of the extensions that I use to work, study and write this blog.
